name: Stock Report Generation System
initial_requirements: I need a website that helps me search for stocks and automatically generate stock analysis reports.

Implicit Requirements.RequirementText: I prefer to search for stocks by entering stock codes or stock names.
I prefer to select the report format and content scope before report generation, instead of using a default report template.
I expect the generated reports to include basic stock information, market trends, and financial data.
I prefer the website to use a white background.
I prefer the website components to use a navy color.

URL: As a user, I want to search for stock information by providing stock codes or names, so that I can find data about specific stocks.
As a user, I want the website to automatically generate stock analysis reports for my choosen, so that I can quickly understand key points.
As a user, I want to select report formats and report content, so that I can control the type of report generated.
As a user, I want the generated reports to include basic stock information, so that I can understand fundamental details.
As a user, I want the generated reports to include market trends, so that I can understand how the stock performs in the market.
